Posts.Content: well yall, we bought that store on the Missouri River, in Nebraska. Were going to be river rats for awhile.....if yall every come to Yankton South Dakota, Were right on the Gaveins Point Dam.  Were coming up on a year that Mel been gone, Kai and Ian are both with me. So my the peace of your creator bless you this season...Journey on michael, kai and ian
Posts.Title: Update on the boy's
Almost a year Mikki, hi jo-ann & and bless you all
